gr.fire.core
Class Theme

java.lang.Object
  gr.fire.core.Theme
Direct Known Subclasses:
FireTheme
public class Theme
extends java.lang.Object

A class that extends Theme can control the look and feel of Fire Components.

Author:
padeler

Value for completly TRANSPARENT "color" value

See Also:
Constant Field Values

scrollSize

public int scrollSize
The size of a scrollbar in pixels. The scroll bar is part of the decoration (right or bottom) and it's size should be always smaller than the corresponding size of the border it is drawn on.
